headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Heist Tips from Master Criminals
content:
Here is some advice to help you if you are struggling with the Heists:

- Make sure you are using a headset. Being able to effectively communicate will drastically improve your chances.
- You can now carry multiple armored vests â€“ stock up at Ammu-Nation and equip a fresh vest via the Interaction Menu.
- For an instant health boost, eat snacks when in cover. All the benefits in half the time.
